resources.string:
This is a simple 'Clicker game', so the rules are easy. 

 * Click the ice cream to collect points 
 * Buy farmers to increase your income 
 * Reach the final level! 

 And that about wraps it up!

This is a novel clicker game i made for a school assignment. I'm currently finishing my last term before graduating 'Computer Science and Application development' at Malmoe University. 

This was a fun little app to make, most of the time i spent on it went on finding assets and deciding on a theme for the app. I currently got some plans on future improvements i can make but for now this is version 1. 

Enjoy! :)
